ryan.project2.ece558.project2

Class QuizQuestion

  • java.lang.Object
    • ryan.project2.ece558.project2.QuizQuestion

  • public class QuizQuestion
extends java.lang.Object
    The quiz question class manages the quiz question items as objects. They are used by the quiz manager to handle the quiz question/answer logic and pass the text needed by the activity for displaying.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      QuizQuestion(org.json.JSONObject questionObject)
      Class Constructor Build the quiz question object from the JSON object passed from the array of quiz objects by parsing the object into strings for the question, answer, and answer options

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean checkAnswer(int answerChoice)
      Check the answer number that was chosen by the user and see if the text matches the answer option in the answer array
      java.lang.String getAnswer()
      Get Answer Text Get the string for the correct response so we can compare it to the radio button selection.
      java.lang.String getAnswerOptions(int num)
      Give the answer options to Quiz Activity so that it can fill in the radio button texts
      java.lang.String getQuestion()
      Get Question Text Return the string for the question so QuizActivity can display it
      void setAnswerOptions(org.json.JSONArray jAnswerOptions)
      Convert the JSON array of answer options to a string array and store it

      • getAnswerOptions

        Returns:

      • setAnswerOptions

        Parameters:

      • checkAnswer

        public boolean checkAnswer(int answerChoice)
        Check the answer number that was chosen by the user and see if the text matches the answer option in the answer array
        Parameters:
        answerChoice - the radio button / array index of the user choice
        Returns:
        true is answer is correct, false otherwise
